I want you to be my wife. In order to give you some property for your livelihood, I have inherited and inherited the following Scheduled Property, which is in my absolute possession and is valued at Rs. 9,44,000/- in characters, nine lakh forty-four thousand rupees. I have transferred the Scheduled Property to you free of charge, without any consideration from you. You shall enjoy the property freely, with all rights, including the right to exchange, gift, and sale, for your children, grandchildren, and descendants, after payment of any and all fees. Neither I nor my other heirs shall have any right whatsoever over this property. I have signed this settlement document with my consent and my will.
K. Babuy

Declaration
1. The immovable property in the Schedule hereto is not a property within the ambit of the A.P Assigned Lands (POT) Act 1977 as per sec (5) and amended Act 19 of 2007
as per Sec 22-A and is hereby certified to be a property mortgaged to the Government and not a property assigned by the Government for public use.
2. The Indian Stamp Act, I/We have duly stated in the said deed the full facts relating to the levy of stamp duty under section 27 of the Act, 1899, the value of the property and the stamp duty payable on the deed.
3. I/We hereby declare that if I/We fail to act as specified in section 27 above, I/We shall be liable to be fined under sections 64, 64A and if stamp duty is imposed on me/us from time to time, I/We hereby consent to the Government collecting the said amount from me/us and to prosecute me/us under section 70.
K. Bahuy

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 2860 of 2025, dated 14-Nov-2025, executed by K Babu in favour of his Wife, K Shyamala towards the property admeasuring an extent of 66 Sq.Yds, bearing house number 4-15/1, Assessment No.201, comprised in survey number 295/8, situated at Venkatapuram No. 65 Village, Tambuganipalli Revenue Village and GramPanchayat, Bangarupalem Mandal, within the District of Chittoor, registered at sub-registrar office Bangarupalem, is bounded as follows: North by: House of Kalpana South by: House of Jayaramaiah East by: C.C. Road West by: C.C. Road Note:Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
